title: Drawing, "Tractor, Model 5010, preliminary sketch, for John Deere", April 24, 1961
medium: Crayon, graphite, traces of pen and black ink on off-white tracing paper
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right: PRELIMINARY.
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right: ND 4-24-61.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper center: APPLIED GRAPHICS & COLOR BAR; right: SEPARATE STAMPED / PART ATTACHED TO / HOOD.
description: Sketch of John Deere tractor with completed details of front and side panels.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Tractor, Model 5010, preliminary sketch, for John Deere", April 24, 1961.
April 24, 1961. Crayon, graphite, traces of pen and black ink on off-white tracing paper. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-385.
